title: [The Handmaidens Room]
description: This room is decorated in a mad profusion of cheerful pastels.  Yellow curtains cover the large bay window opposite the door, and a thick pink rug covers the floor.  The large four-post bed features oversized pillows of pale green and blue above an elaborately embroidered comforter.  An elegant crystal vase on each night table holds a small bouquet of crocuses.
